pageTitle: Welcome back, {{name}}! Check out your learning progress
subject: Subject
selectHeatmapPrompt: Please select a metric to display your heatmap.

year.time: In {{monthName}} you had {{activityLabel}}. You learned for {{timeStr}}.
year.completed: In {{monthName}} you had {{activityLabel}}. You completed {{tasks}} tasks.
year.correct: In {{monthName}} you had {{activityLabel}}. You answered {{correct}} tasks correctly.

recommendations.streak: You're on a {{count}} {{dayLabel}} learning streak ‚Äì keep it up!
recommendations.avgTime: You're averaging {{hours}} hours and {{minutes}} minutes of learning per day ‚Äì great consistency!
recommendations.morning: You're most focused and effective at learning in the morning.
recommendations.afternoon: You show the most learning activity in the afternoon ‚Äì a productive time!
recommendations.evening: You concentrate and learn most in the evening ‚Äì perfect for quiet study sessions.
recommendations.activeDay: Your most active learning day is {{day}}.
recommendations.quizTotal: You've answered a total of {{count}} quiz questions ‚Äì great participation!
recommendations.quizAccuracy: Your quiz accuracy is at {{percent}}% ‚Äì keep up the good work!
recommendations.quizTimeAccuracy: Your quiz performance is best in the {{slot}} ‚Äì great concentration during this time!
recommendations.trendUp: Your learning time has increased compared to last week ‚Äì keep going!
recommendations.trendDown: Your learning time has slightly decreased compared to last week ‚Äì you can do it!

intro.hey: Hey {{name}}! Keep an eye on your learning progress with your personal Learning HeatMaps. üî•
intro.description: They show you when and how intensively you have learned ‚Äì whether by day, week, month, or for the whole year.
intro.metricTime: ‚è±Ô∏è Time: How many minutes or hours you have actively learned.
intro.metricCompleted: ‚úÖ Completed Tasks: How many tasks you have finished.
intro.metricCorrect: üéØ Correct Tasks: How often you found the right solution.
intro.proTip: üí° Pro-Tip: Hover over a cell to see how much you accomplished that day.

dayView.title: Day View
dayView.tooltip: Shows your learning activity per hour for the selected day.

weekView.title: Week View
weekView.tooltip: Shows how active you were on each weekday at different times of the day.

monthView.title: Month View
monthView.tooltip: Shows your activity per day in the selected month.

yearView.title: Year View
yearView.tooltip: Shows your total learning activity per month for the year.
